name: Blackhole Falling!
description:
Blackhole Falling!

Escape the Blackhole in Blackhole Falling! The player must guide Pixel through levels. Blackhole Falling is easy to learn and even more enjoyable. Download Free Today!

Blackhole Falling is about a young unit of blue light named Pixel. Pixel fell in a blackhole and got separated from his family. To escape, Pixel must go through deep space, the digital cloud, an asteroid field, and more! Blackhole Falling features peaceful music, bright colors, and challenging levels. In the game the player must guide Pixel through levels avoiding obstacles. Blackhole Falling is easy to learn and even more enjoy
